Action.author: ales
Action.body: Date: Wed Jan 23 12:21:36 2019 -0500 FAB-13850 Change +lifecycle to _lifecycle The old + symbol creates some complications in parsing of the name in environment variables, and _ is a better understood symbol to indicate system namespaces. Previously we were under the impression that chaincodes could not begin with an underscore, but, it turns out that it actually is acceptable. Change-Id: Ic5dd2e3494bfbc700a6a7265ea8faddb1e8bcaef Signed-off-by: Jason Yellick {noformat} This CR was never cherry picked to any release branch and so we are okay. >
